entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
